item.title: Missing Productivity Growth
item.description: IGM FORUM Syverson, Chad. 2017. “Challenges to Mismeasurement Explanations for the US Productivity Slowdown.” Journal of Economic Perspectives, 31 (2): 165-86. David M. Byrne & John G. Fernald & Marshall B. Reinsdorf, 2016. “Does the United States Have a Productivity Slowdown or a Measurement Problem?,” Brookings Papers on Economic Activity, Economic Studies Program, The Brookings Institution, vol. 47(1 (Spring), pages 109-182. Aghion, Philippe & Bergeaud, Antonin & Boppart, Timo & Klenow, Peter J.
